metadata.title: Complete Genome Sequence of Middle East Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus KOR/KNIH/002_05_2015, Isolated in South Korea

abstract.original_text: The full genome sequence of a Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV) was identified from cultured and isolated in Vero cells. The viral genome sequence has high similarity to 53 human MERS-CoVs, ranging from 99.5% to 99.8% at the nucleotide level.

sentences.segment_text: The full genome sequence of a Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus ( MERS-CoV ) was identified from cultured and isolated in Vero cells .
The viral genome sequence has high similarity to 53 human MERS-CoVs ,
ranging from 99.5 % to 99.8 % at the nucleotide level .
